P-4 P427 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34) 2000 JGTC Series GT500 Class 2nd Place É. Comas/M. Kageyama



Érik Comas & Masami Kageyama drove the #1 Loctite Nissan Skyline for the Nismo team in the 2000 JGTC Series. Comas & Kageyama started the season strong with a win in round 1 - the Motegi GT Championship Race. Top 10 finishes in the other rounds except for a DNF in round 3 (due to engine trouble) put them in 2nd place overall in GT500 class.
